item.description:
Shepard Fairey
The artist behind the iconic Obama portrait


The Institute of Contemporary Art/Boston will open the first museum survey of Shepard Fairey, the influential street artist who created the now iconic Obama poster. Fairey is one of todayâ€™s best known and most influential street artists. This exhibition will include stenciled stickers from early guerilla art campaigns, screenprints, works on wood and metal, and some of his most recent work.

The ICA is free on Thursday evenings.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll update closer to the date.
item.name: Shepard Fairey at the ICA
